title: Disney revenue up on 'Black Panther'
text:
Disney revenue up on 'Black Panther' 3:52am IST - 01:48
Walt Disney reported a 9 percent rise in quarterly revenue, powered by the box-office success of superhero movie ''Black Panther'' as well as higher attendance and spending in its theme parks and resorts business. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Walt Disney reported a 9 percent rise in quarterly revenue, powered by the box-office success of superhero movie "Black Panther" as well as higher attendance and spending in its theme parks and resorts business. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2FWzKPW
